item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 12 Sep 2023
item.description:
1. Miou, a simple scheduler for OCaml 5
  2. Eio Digest #1 (September 2023)
  3. Help revamping the getting started tutorials in ocaml.org
  4. pcre2-ocaml.7.5.1 released
  5. Third (and hopefully last) release candidate for OCaml 5.1.0
  6. Ocaml.org tutorial revamping, cont'd - Basic Datatypes
  7. Printing, modular implicits and the Stdlib
  8. Ocaml.org tutorial revamping, con'd - Values and Functions
